title: Tandem Theory ranks on Inc. 5000 for fifth time
statement: Tandem Theory ranks on the 2024 Inc. 5000 list for the 5th time, announced on August 13, 2024.

citations.quote: For the 5th Time, Tandem Theory Ranks on the Inc. 5000... Inc. revealed today that Tandem Theory... ranks on the 2024 Inc. 5000
